flawed_nl_solution:
Since Marlon spent half of the gift card, then half of it which is $200/2 = $<<200/2=1000>>1000 remained on Monday.
Then on Tuesday, he spent $1000/4 = $<<1000/4=250>>250.
Therefore, he has $1000 - $250 = $<<1000-250=750>>750 left in his gift card.
#### 750

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
